item.description:
I (AJ) will host this meetup.  As some of you know, I am an Alumni of Clarkson Univeristy.

This coming Saturday afternoon the Women's Clarkson Golden Knight's Hockey team will be in town to face Yale.  I invite you to come sit on the VISITORS SIDE and help support my Alma Mater.  (Visitors Side is to the right as you enter from the Sachem Street Entrance, think closer to Prospect Street.)

I bold VISITORS SIDE since this meetup is to root for CLARKSON, if you would like to root for Yale on that other side then it will be kind of hard for you to meeup with me in this case.

I will attempt to confirm some time this week, but previous years tickets were $5 at the Door.

If you would like to dress festively, Clarksons colors are Green and Gold.

Womens games in the past have not been busy, so there will probably be a very limited number of groups to find me from on the Visitors side.  I'm likely to be wearing a old Jersey (#15, Evans).

However if you have trouble you can try to get me by Cell Phone at: 315-345-9348.

Before the holiday break Clarkson's women were ranked #2 in the NCAA, tied for 4th in the ECAC.  (and no, Yale was not above them in either case.)  They suffered a couple of tough losses the first week back, so it's time to bounce back.

Parking: There is a lot of Metered and Pay Station Street Parking avaialable on Prospect Street, Sachem Street, and a few others in that area.  (The Arena is at the corner of Prospect and Sachem.)  There are also Yale lots/garage adjactent to the arena, but I am not sure if it will be maned/full or not for this game.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for AJ, seated some where on the VISITORS side, or try Cell phone 315-345-9348.
item.name: Women's College Hockey: Cheer for the Clarkson Golden Knights
